entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
